modals.aboutSpreadText: These nine-card openings are designed to delve deeper into the problems in your relationship, providing extensive information about the source of problems, solutions, and future predictions.
modals.cardCountText: Each card represents a different aspect of your relationship.
modals.creditConfirmMessage: Do you want to continue this reading?
modals.detailedReadingText: Voice reading offers a warm, detailed view of the nodes in your relationship, and with your questions and information shared, you will receive a completely specific comment.
modals.infoTitle: About the Opening of Relationship Problems
modals.loveAttention: After your reading has been recorded, your personal comment is usually delivered by email within two hundred and four hours. This work is for guidance; the final choices are always yours.

modals.writtenReadingText: The written reading is delivered as a detailed report that you can hide and return if you wish.

career.description: 7 card special openings for career and business
career.name: Career Development

1.description: Evaluate whether your current career is really what you want
1.title: Is this really the career I want?

2.description: The concrete steps you can take to improve your career
2.title: What steps can I take to improve my career?

3.description: Things in your career that you can't control or change.
3.title: Is there any part of my career that I can't change?

4.description: The level of performance and effort you have shown in your current career
4.title: Am I doing the best I can in my career?

5.description: Changes and improvements that will contribute positively to your career
5.title: What changes can I make to help my career?

6.description: How your past experiences affect your current career
6.title: What obstacles in my past affect my current career?

7.description: The overall result of your career journey and future predictions
7.title: What will be the result?

love.description: Four-card special opening for love and relationships.
love.name: The Opening of Love

4.description: The long-term result of the relationship
4.title: The long-term result of the relationship

marriage.description: 10 card special openings for marriage and marriage
marriage.name: Marriage Statement

1.description: It shows the overall outcome of your marriage process and how it will proceed.
1.title: What will be the result?

2.description: It shows you how to improve yourself until you find the right person.
2.title: What am I supposed to do while I'm waiting for my wife?

3.description: In marriage, it shows your harmony and sharing in financial matters.
3.title: Are we going to share our financial resources with each other?

4.description: It shows whether both sides are ready for marriage and the desire to commit.
4.title: Are we both going to want to commit?

5.description: It shows your common values, your similarities, and your harmony.
5.title: Will we have similar features?

6.description: It'll show you what family approval and family relationships will be like.
6.title: Will this person's family accept me?

7.description: It shows you how to meet and meet the right person.
7.title: How do we find each other?

8.description: It shows your communication harmony and your ability to understand each other.
8.title: Can we make a deal?

9.description: It shows the qualities of your ideal mate and the person who will be compatible with you.
9.title: What kind of wife is appropriate for me?

10.description: It shows your potential for marriage and your chance for marriage.
10.title: Will I be able to get married?

money.description: Eight-card pyramid opening for financial situation and money issues
money.name: Currency Open

3.description: How can I use money to make me happy?
3.title: Use of Money

5.description: What are my responsibilities for a good financial life?
5.title: Financial Responsibilities

6.description: New plans for my financial investments or savings
6.title: New Financial Plans

8.description: What special skills do I have to make money with?
8.title: Earning Skills

newLover.description: Six-card special opening for a new love affair.
newLover.name: A New Lover's Statement

1.description: The future relationship shows your potential
1.title: Am I going to have a new relationship soon?

2.description: Shows the astrological properties of your future partner
2.title: Which horoscope will this person be from?

3.description: Shows compatibility and dissonance in your relationship
3.title: Will we be in sync with each other?

4.description: Shows the continuity and depth of your relationship
4.title: Is there going to be a long-term relationship?

5.description: Shows the potential for spiritual connection and deep love
5.title: Could this person be my soul mate?

6.description: Love shows the possibility that your wish will come true
6.title: Will my wish come true?

problemSolving.description: Ten-card detailed expansion for problem analysis and solution
problemSolving.name: Problem Solving Explanation

1.description: The main question or subject that constitutes the basis of the opening
1.title: Question Asked

2.description: The main obstacle or challenge in front of the problem
2.title: The Obstruction of the Problem

3.description: The origins of the subject's subconscious or the effects of the past
3.title: The History of Consciousness

4.description: It's the best we can do for ourselves.
4.title: Best Potential

5.description: Recent events or influences related to the issue
5.title: Close History

6.description: Possible developments in the near future
6.title: The Near Future

7.description: Our current situation, our current state of affairs.
7.title: Current Status

8.description: External factors, environmental conditions that affect the subject
8.title: External Effects

9.description: Our internal fears and concerns about the matter
9.title: Fears and Concerns

10.description: The final outcome of the subject or event, the possible solution
10.title: The Result of the Event

data.detailedTitle: Relationship Analysis Explanation - Details Personal Reading

relationshipAnalysis.description: 7-card special opening for relationship analysis and evaluation
relationshipAnalysis.name: Relationship Analysis Explanation

1.description: The current conditions of the relationship provide information about the situation and the atmosphere created by problems.
1.title: Current Status

2.description: Your feelings, your thoughts, and your perspective on your partner reflect your emotional state in the relationship.
2.title: Your Feelings

3.description: It shows your concerns, expectations, and dreams about your relationship or your situation.
3.title: Your Expectations

4.description: It contains advice on the nature of your relationship's conduct, showing you how to behave.
4.title: Advice

5.description: In this relationship or in the face of the existing problem, it guides you in your attitude and in what way you should take it.
5.title: Path Map

6.description: It shows your partner's concerns, expectations, and dreams about your relationship or your situation.
6.title: Your Partner's Expectations

7.description: It shows how your partner feels, how he thinks and how he looks at you, how he feels about the relationship.
7.title: Your Partner's Feelings

data.detailedTitle: The Opening of Relationship Problems - Details Personal Reading

relationshipProblems.description: 9-card special opening for relationship problems analysis and solution
relationshipProblems.name: The Opening of Relationship Problems

1.description: It shows internal contradictions and conflicts in your relationship, and it helps you to understand what you disagree about and why you have conflict.
1.title: What's the contradiction?

2.description: It reveals the main problem and the fundamental problem in your relationship, which is the biggest challenge.
2.title: What's wrong?

3.description: It shows your share and responsibility in the source of the problem, helping you to understand how your own actions contribute to the problem.
3.title: Did I create the problem?

4.description: It shows your position in accepting your own responsibility, revealing whether you're ignoring your own mistakes.
4.title: Am I ignoring my share of the problem?

5.description: Your past experiences with your partner affect the present problems, helping you to understand how the past reflects today.
5.title: My past experiences with the person I've been with

6.description: In your relationship, it shows mutual respect and healthy boundaries, how you affect each other and whether you harm them or not.
6.title: Are we abusing each other?

7.description: It shows external factors and third parties that affect your relationship, and it helps you to understand how family, friends or other people affect your problem.
7.title: Are there other people involved in our problem?

8.description: Money, work, financial situation, things that affect your relationship, it reveals how economic problems affect your relationship.
8.title: Are there financial problems affecting our relationship?

9.description: It predicts the future of your relationship, informs whether the current problems will be resolved and whether the relationship will continue.
9.title: Will this relationship last?

situationAnalysis.description: 7-card special opening for status analysis and evaluation
situationAnalysis.name: State Analysis Explanation

1.description: The reasons for the situation, why this is happening now, and all the mistakes that have been made, are on this card.
1.title: History or Reasons

2.description: What is happening now is stated as to the issues on the agenda and what effect the past has on today.
2.title: Current Status

3.description: Events that happen without a person's knowledge, behind their backs, hidden jobs, and unknown facts are hidden in this card.
3.title: Hidden Ethics

4.description: It represents the center of the opening, the person at the center of the situation, or the most central area in your life.
4.title: Central Card

5.description: It offers information from different sources and angles to the future, as well as foreign attacks and possible plots.
5.title: Outcasters

6.description: It tells us what is the most appropriate course of action about the situation. It is stated that it can offer a solution or a way out.
6.title: Advice

7.description: It shows where the current course of action will lead, possible obstacles or surprises. The future can change depending on decisions to be made.
7.title: Possible Future - Result
